name: BROKEN// Doll/a/rs $4 Google Images
description:
Wooo.

non-weeaboo-version:
use "http://dorura.files.wordpress.com/2010/02/dollars-no-weeaboo-logo.png"
As the background image in the body div.

If your url doesn't show up for the background-image canceling on the search page, at the bottom of the code, you'll see a list of urls. Just add your own google .domain, and it should work fine.
